summary:
French Entrepreneur - Founder and Managing Partner of ROCH Ventures.
Founder and CEO of several start-ups including GOV, French Civic-Tech leader acquired by Boston Consulting Group (BCG). 
Former Head of Innovation for Boston Consulting Group (BCG) in charge of the investment, development, and launch of new software products for all industries and practice areas.
industryName: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
headline: Founder & Managing Partner at ROCH Ventures

experience.description:
ROCH Ventures is a Luxembourg based VC fund providing Seed and Series A funding to startups in the Travel & Tourism sector. 
We believe that Travel & Tourism is entering a new cycle of changes and that technology and sustainability will be the key drivers of opportunities and outperformance. 
We detect, select, and enable the future winners providing our investors with the highest returns.
experience.title: Founder & Managing Partner

experience.description: Oversee product innovation at BCG (inclusive of investment, incubation, development, and GTM strategy of new software products)
experience.title: Director of Innovation

experience.description:
Orange Business Services provides communication services to companies of all sizes in France and internationally. Its network, the most extensive in the world, connects people, sites and machines to improve the digital experience of customers and employees.
More than 160 countries and territories covered
21,500 employees
15 research and innovation laboratories
227 million customers
experience.title: Advisory Board Member

experience.description:
Head of TUNED by BCG.
BCG change management app, helps companies bring a new, more powerful approach to communicating and engaging with employees during organisational change efforts.
experience.title: Director

experience.description:
Founded in 2014, GOV rapidly achieved popularity and acclaim on social and political matters before extending its focus to dialogue between brands and clients, local authorities and citizens, and companies and employees. By facilitating direct dialog and protecting the confidentiality of users, it created the conditions for trustworthy quantitative and qualitative insights and analysis. 
The app was acquired by Boston Consulting Group in 2017.
experience.title: Co-Founder GOV (exited)

education.fieldOfStudy: Sciences Economiques et Sociales Option Anglais
